channel.title: AI on Smriti Suresh
channel.description: Recent content in AI on Smriti Suresh

item.title: The Originality Score Project
item.description: Motivation The advent of Large Language Models and Neural Networks to generate human-like texts and responses has made a lasting impact on how AI will play a considerable role in automating several corporate and academic environments. Our project intends to evaluate the measure of how original a given text is and possibly classify it as AI or Human-written. Currently, ChatGPT [OpenAI, 2022] has the best performance among the tools in the market in terms of generating coherent and persuasive answers.
